long_description: The REI XT 75 hipbelt is designed specifically for women and replaces the hipbelt on the REI XT 75 backpack. Precurved design comfortably matches your anatomy from day 1; air mesh surface promotes ventilation for cool comfort. Webbing system adjusts with a forward pull in an ergonomic motion. Pocket provides handy storage for items needed on the hike. Lash points make it easy to keep camera and GPS pouches within easy reach.
short_description: The REI XT 75 hipbelt is designed specifically for women and replaces the hipbelt on the REI XT 75 backpack.
